name: ben lunato explains the meaning of paningts to you on a tinder date
name_original: ben lunato explains the meaning of paningts to you on a tinder date
description:
This game is based on A short monologue I concocted for a painting within the Swedish National Art Gallery. As a gallery is closed At the time of making this game I was unable to deliver the speech in person so have instead created a short walking experience focused around my monologue on the specific qualities and perfection of a single painting within the museum.

This experience is five minutes long and is only accessible through my patron. OST Nicholas Lowery nicks bandcamp
